Description: Key ResponsibilitiesØ Prepare CMA reports, schedules, and correspondences, ensuring compliance with all CMA requirements and follow all the circulars.Ø Handle CMA portal tasks such as registering positions, renewing positions, renewing licenses, etc.Ø Develop, update, and implement the company's systems, procedures, and controls related to anti-money laundering and combating terrorism financing.Ø Handle all correspondences with the Ministry of Commerce, Ministry of Interior, and Ministry of JusticeSkills
